name: General Dhikr
description: Everyday remembrances for continuous connection with Allah

dhikrs.title: Tahlil - Declaration of Oneness
dhikrs.translation: There is no deity worthy of worship except Allah.
dhikrs.benefits: The best dhikr, key to Paradise, removes sins

dhikrs.title: Tasbih - Glorification
dhikrs.benefits: Plants a tree in Paradise for each recitation

dhikrs.title: Tahmid - Praise
dhikrs.translation: All praise is due to Allah.
dhikrs.benefits: Fills the scales of good deeds

dhikrs.title: Takbir - Magnification
dhikrs.benefits: Greater than the world and all it contains

dhikrs.title: Istighfar - Seeking Forgiveness
dhikrs.benefits: Opens doors of mercy and sustenance

dhikrs.title: Salawat on the Prophet
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammad
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
dhikrs.benefits: Allah sends ten blessings for each one recited
